title: Bryant leaves Lakers' exhibition with bruised left leg
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer: Sports - Today 
Kobe Bryant has left the Lakers' exhibition game against Sacramento with a bruised left leg and will not return. … Click to Continue »...
